underlying_goal: Debug and fix a broken Slidev presentation file that had parser errors and image path issues, and document the solution.
friction_detail: The main friction was a Slidev parser bug where '---' inside HTML comments broke rendering. The agent first tried removing comments, then replacing '---' with '~~~', before arriving at the correct solution (commenting content and dividers separately) with user guidance. There were also issues with image paths during PDF export from a subdirectory.
primary_success: Correctly diagnosed a non-obvious Slidev parser bug and, through iteration with the user, implemented a robust fix and documented it as a best practice in CLAUDE.md and a new skill.
brief_summary: A long debugging session to fix a Slidev presentation. The agent diagnosed that '---' inside HTML comments was breaking the parser, and after several attempts, implemented a pattern of commenting content and dividers separately. This solution was then documented in project files and a new global skill.
